Name: AlarmClock (tool_name)
Description: Manages alarms on the device, including creation, searching, and modification.

Functions.description: Creates one or more new alarms.

alarms.description: An array of alarm objects to be created.

time.description: The time for the alarm in `hh:mma` format (eg `07:30AM`).

label.description: A descriptive name or label for the alarm (e.g., 'Wake up', 'Meeting reminder').

snooze.description: Whether the snooze option should be allowed for this alarm. Defaults to true if omitted.

repeat_days.description: An array of full weekday names (lowercase, e.g., 'monday', 'tuesday') on which the alarm should repeat (be active). If omitted, the alarm will not repeat.

Functions.description: Searches for existing alarms based on provided criteria and can optionally perform an action (delete, enable, disable) on the matched alarms.

label.description: A string to search alarms based on their label. Can be blank to match all alarms, or a partial match.

time.description: An optional time in `HH:mm` format (eg `07:30` or `19:30`) to use as an additional search parameter to filter alarms.

action.description: The action to perform on the matched alarms. Defaults to 'search' if omitted.
